name: Agricultural Espionage
description:
Game made for MiniJam 53

Game Info

You are a farmer who would like to retire.

But you need money to retire, don't you?

So in the little farming oasis you are a part of, you need to commit arson to shut down your opposition in order to make sure more people buy your produce. The more farms you burn down, the more popular you become, and the more money you will make from selling your own produce.
Without any competition in the market, the demand for your crops will skyrocket and you will sell your crops for exorbitant prices!

But be careful... if you're spotted committing arson in someone elses farm then you will lose your reputation and lose!

Can you build up £500,000 for your retirement fund? Give it a go!

Controls
Escape - closes the game. Under no circumstances will it not.

WASD - Movement

1, 2, 3 (or J, K, L) - Swap crops

E - Interact (and close shop)

Team

This game was made by three lads from Sheffield, Leon, John, and Harry. 

Leon provided the coding expertise,

John provided the artwork,

Harry provided the music.

Leon & John run a development twitter for their games.
